test-group.name: Given the user is logged in
When the user is on the Dashboard page
Then they should see the definition 'An edible fruit produced by the pear tree, similar to an apple but elongated towards the stem.'

test-step.description: Should see definition: An edible fruit produced by the pear tree, similar to an apple but elongated towards the stem.
